 2008-15202008-09-04,  HERITAGE,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Race Relations Foundation Act
PrecisReappointment of ASHRAF GHANEM of Fredericton, New Brunswick, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Race Relations Foundation to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, effective September 9, 2008.
